anya-e0802n2:5_0: Yathā yathā jinavacanayuttaṁ hi liṅgaṁ, tathā tathā idha liṅgañca nippajjate.
anya-e0802n2:6_0: Taṁ yathā? Eso no satthā, brahmā attā, sakhā, rājā.
anya-e0802n2:8_0: Tato jinavacanayuttehi liṅgehi vibhattiyo parā honti.
anya-e0802n2:9_0: 55, 63.Si yo, aṁ yo, nā hi, sa naṁ, smā hi, sa naṁ, smiṁ su.
anya-e0802n2:10_1: Si, yo iti paṭhamā, aṁ, yoiti dutiyā, nā hi iti tatiyā, sa, naṁiti catutthī, smā, hi iti pañcamī, sa, naṁ iti chaṭṭhī, smiṁ, su iti sattamī.
anya-e0802n2:11_0: Vibhattiiccanena kvattho? Amhassa mamaṁ savibhattissa se.
anya-e0802n2:13_0: Yathā yathā tesaṁ jinavacanānaṁ anuparodho. Tathā tathā idha liṅgañca nippajjate.
anya-e0802n2:16_0: Bhoti ayye, bhoti kaññe, bhoti kharādiye.
anya-e0802n2:22_0: Isino , aggino, gahapatino, daṇḍino. Setuno, ketuno, bhikkhuno. Sayambhuno, abhibhuno.
anya-e0802n2:23_0: Jhalaiccanena kvattho? Jhalato sassa no vā.
anya-e0802n2:25_0: Te ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā yadā itthikhyā, tadā pasaññā honti.
anya-e0802n2:30_0: Ākāro yadā itthikhyo, tadā ghasañño hoti.
anya-e0802n2:31_0: Saddhāya, kaññāya, vīṇāya, gaṅgāya, disāya sālāya, mālāya, tulāya, dolāya, pabhāya, sobhāya, paññāya, karuṇāya nāvāya, kapālikāya.
anya-e0802n2:33_0: Itthikhyoti kimatthaṁ? Satthārā desito ayaṁ dhammo.
anya-e0802n2:37_0: Purisassa, aggissa, isissa, daṇḍissa, bhikkhussa, sayambhussa, abhibhussa.
anya-e0802n2:41_0: Etissaṁ, etissā imissaṁ, imissā, tissaṁ, tissā,
anya-e0802n2:42_0: Tassaṁ tassā, yassaṁ, yassā, amussaṁ, amussā.
anya-e0802n2:47_0: Etāimāiccetesamanto saro ikāro hoti saṁsāsu ekavacanesu vibhattādesesu.
anya-e0802n2:52_0: Tassā itthiyaṁ vattamānassa antassa ākārassa ikāro hoti vā saṁsāsu ekavacanesu vibhattādesesu.
anya-e0802n2:55_0: Tato tā etā imāto sassa vibhattissa ssāyādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:60_0: Tassaṁ, tassā, yassaṁ, yassā, sabbassaṁ, sabbassā.
anya-e0802n2:64_0: Dviiccevamādito saṅkhyāto nakārāgamo hoti naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:65_0: Dvinnaṁ, tinnaṁ, catunnaṁ, pañcannaṁ, channaṁ, sattannaṁ, aṭṭhannaṁ, navannaṁ, dasannaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:68_0: Caggahaṇenassañcāgamo hoti. Catassannaṁ itthīnaṁ tissannaṁ vedanānaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:70_0: Paiccetasmā smiṁsmāiccetesaṁ aṁāādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:71_1: Nikatiyaṁ, nikatyā, nikatiyā, vikatyaṁ, vikatiyaṁ, vikatyā, vikatiyā, viratyaṁ, viratiyaṁ, viratyā, viratiyā, ratyaṁ, ratiyaṁ, ratyā, ratiyā, puthabyaṁ, puthaviyaṁ, puthabyā, puthaviyā, pavatyaṁ, pavatyā, pavattiyaṁ, pavattiyā.
anya-e0802n2:75_0: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Ādismiṁ, ādimhi nāthaṁ namassitvāna,
anya-e0802n2:76_0: Caggahaṇena aññasmāpi smiṁ vacanassa ā o aṁādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:76_1: Divā ca ratto ca haranti ye bali.
anya-e0802n2:78_0: Jhalaiccetesaṁ iya uvaiccete ādesā honti vā sare pare yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:79_0: Tiyantaṁ pacchiyāgāre, aggiyāgāre, bhikkhuvāsane nisīdati, vuthuvāsane nisīdati.
anya-e0802n2:80_1: Timalaṁ, tiphalaṁ, ticatukkaṁ, tidaṇḍaṁ, tilokaṁ, tinayanaṁ, tipāsaṁ, tihaṁsaṁ, tibhavaṁ, tikhandhaṁ, tipiṭakaṁ, tivedanaṁ, catuddisaṁ, puthubhūtaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:82_0: Vāti vikappanatthaṁ, ikārassa ayādeso hoti, vatthuttayaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:84_0: Jhalānaṁ yakāra vakārādesā honti sare pare yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:88_0: Pasaññassa ca ivaṇṇassa vibhattādese sare pare yakārādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:92_0: Goiccetassa okārassa āvādeso hoti se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:95_0: Goiccetassa okārassa āvādeso hoti yoiccetesu paresu.
anya-e0802n2:96_0: Gāvo gacchanti, gāvo passanti, gāvī gacchanti, gāvī passanti.
anya-e0802n2:97_0: Caggahaṇaṁ kimatthaṁ? Nāsmāsmiṁsu vacanesu āvā deso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:100_0: Goiccetassa okārassa āvaavaiccete ādesā honti aṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:102_0: Caggahaṇena sādisesesu pubbuttavacanesu goiccetassa okārassa avādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:103_0: Gavassa, gavo, gavena, gavā, gave, gavesu.
anya-e0802n2:105_0: Āvaiccetassa gāvādesassa anta sarassa ukārādeso hoti vā aṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:109_0: Tato gosaddato naṁvacanassa aṁādeso hoti, goiccetassa okārassa avādeso hoti patimhi pare alutte ca samāse.
anya-e0802n2:112_0: Caggahaṇena asamāsepi naṁvacanassa aṁādeso hoti, goiccetassa okārassa avādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:115_0: Goiccetassa okārassa avādeso hoti samāse ca sare pare.
anya-e0802n2:117_0: Caggahaṇena uvaṇṇaiccevamantānaṁ liṅgānaṁ uvaavaurādesā honti smiṁyoiccetesu kvaci.
anya-e0802n2:121_0: Tassa avasaddassa yadā upapade tiṭṭhamānassa tassa okārassa viparīto hoti byañjane pare.
anya-e0802n2:125_0: Sabbasseva gosaddassa goṇādeso hoti vā naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:129_0: Sabbā gāvī ujuṁ yanti, nette ujuṁ gate sati.
anya-e0802n2:132_0: Suhināiccetesu sabbassa gosaddassa goṇādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:134_0: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Gosu, gohi, gobhi, gavena.
anya-e0802n2:135_0: Caggahaṇena syādisesesu pubbuttaravacanesupi goṇa gu gavayādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:135_1: Goṇo, goṇā, goṇaṁ, goṇe, goṇassa, goṇamhā.
anya-e0802n2:137_0: Aṁvacanassa makārassa ca jhalapaiccetehi niggahitaṁ hoti
anya-e0802n2:138_0: Aggiṁ, isiṁ, gahapatiṁ, daṇḍiṁ, mahesiṁ, bhikkhuṁ, paṭuṁ, sayambhuṁ, abhibhuṁ, rattiṁ, itthiṁ, vadhuṁ, pulliṅgaṁ, pumbhāvo, puṅkokilo.
anya-e0802n2:139_0: Aṁmoti kimatthaṁ? Agginā, pāṇinā, bhikkhunā, rattiyā, itthiyā, vadhuyā.
anya-e0802n2:141_0: Punārambha haṇaṁ vibhāsānivattanatthaṁ. Aggiṁ, paṭuṁ, buddhiṁ, vadhuṁ.
anya-e0802n2:143_0: Saralopo hoti amādesapaccayādimhi sara lope tu pakati hoti.
anya-e0802n2:144_0: Purisaṁ, purise, pāpaṁ, pāpe, pāpiyo, pāpiṭṭho.
anya-e0802n2:145_0: Amādesapaccayādimhīti ki tthaṁ? Appamādo amataṁ padaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:148_0: Pakatiggahaṇasāmatthena puna sandhibhāvo ca hoti. Seyyo, seṭṭho, jeyyo, jeṭṭho.
anya-e0802n2:157_0: Sismiṁ anapuṁsakāni liṅgāni na rassamāpajjante. Itthī, bhikkhunī, vadhū, daṇḍī, sayambhū.
anya-e0802n2:158_0: Sismiṁnti kimatthaṁ? Bhoti itthi, bhoti vadhu, bho daṇḍi, bho sayambhu.
anya-e0802n2:159_0: Anapuṁsakānīti kimatthaṁ? Sukhakāri dānaṁ, sukhakāri sīlaṁ, sīghayāyi cittaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:165_0: Naṁvacanassa iṇṇaṁ iṇṇannaṁ iccete ādesā honti tīhi saṅkhyāhi.
anya-e0802n2:170_0: Aggī, bhikkhū, rattī, yāgū, aṭṭhī, aṭṭhīni, āyū, āyūni, sabbāni, yāni, tāni, kāni, katamāni, etāni, apūni, imāni.
anya-e0802n2:171_0: Yosvīti kimatthaṁ? Aggi, bhikkhu, ratti, yāgu, sabbo, yo, so, ko, amuko.
anya-e0802n2:173_0: Punārambhaggahaṇaṁ kimatthaṁ? Niccadīpanatthaṁ. Aggī, bhikkhū, rattī, yāni, tāni, katamāni.
anya-e0802n2:176_0: Aggīsu, aggīnaṁ, aggīhi, rattīsu, rattīnaṁ, rattīhi. Bhikkhūsu, bhikkhūnaṁ, bhikkhūhi. Purisānaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:178_1: Sukhettesu brahmacārisu, dhammamakkhāsi bhagavā bhikkhunaṁ datvā sakehi pāṇibhi.
anya-e0802n2:181_0: Pañcasu, pañcannaṁ, pañcahi, chasu, channaṁ, chahi, sattasu, sattannaṁ, sattahi, aṭṭhasu, aṭṭhannaṁ, aṭṭhahi, navasu, navannaṁ, navahi, dasasu, dasannaṁ, dasahi.
anya-e0802n2:193_0: Caggahaṇena aññesu vacanesu attañca hoti. Guṇavantasmiṁ, guṇavantena.
anya-e0802n2:194_0: Antaggahaṇena ntupaccayassa anto attamāpajjate, yonañca ikāro hoti. Guṇavanti.
anya-e0802n2:196_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa attaṁ hoti vā aṁsaiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:197_0: Satimaṁ bhikkhu, satimantaṁ bhikkhuṁ vā, bandhumaṁ rājānaṁ, bandhumantaṁ rājānaṁ vā, satimassa bhikkhuno, satimato bhikkhuno vā, bandhumassa rañño suṅkaṁ, bandhumato rañño vā suṅkaṁ deti.
anya-e0802n2:198_0: Etesvīti kimatthaṁ? Satimā bhikkhu, bandhumā rājā.
anya-e0802n2:200_0: Ntupaccayassa antassa attaṁ hoti vā simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:204_0: Aggissantassa ini hoti vā simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:205_0: Purato aggini, pacchato aggini, dakkhiṇato aggini, vāmato aggini.
anya-e0802n2:220_0: Mātulaiccevamādīnaṁ anto ānattamāpajjate īkāre paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:222_0: Īkāreti kimatthaṁ? Bhikkhunī, rājinī, jālinī, gahapatānī.
anya-e0802n2:223_0: Ānattaggahaṇena nadīiccetassa dīsaddassa jjojjā ādesā honti saha vibhattiyā yonāsaiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:223_1: Najjo sandanti, najjā kataṁ taraṅgaṁ, najjā nerañjarāya tīre.
anya-e0802n2:225_0: Sabbato liṅgato smāhismiṁ iccetesaṁ mhābhimhiiccete ādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:226_0: Purisamhā, purisasmā, purisebhi, purisehi, purisamhi, purisasmiṁ.
anya-e0802n2:227_1: Vaṇṇavantaṁ agandhakaṁ viruḷhapupphaṁ, mahantaṁ chattaṁ mahāchattaṁ, mahantaṁ dhajaṁ mahādhajaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:229_0: Ta imaiccetehi katākārehi smāsmiṁ naṁmhāmhiiccete ādesā neva honti.
anya-e0802n2:230_0: Asmā ṭhānā bhayaṁ uppajjati, asmiṁ ṭhāne bhayaṁ tiṭṭhati, asmā, asmiṁ.
anya-e0802n2:231_0: Katākārehīti kimatthaṁ? Tamhā, tamhi, imamhā, imamhi.
anya-e0802n2:234_0: Sabbesu, yesu, tesu, kesu, purisesu, imesu, kusalesu, tumhesu, amhesu, sabbehi, yehi, tehi, kehi, purisehi, imehi, kusalehi, tumhehi, amhehi.
anya-e0802n2:236_0: Sabbesaṁ sabbanāmānaṁ anto akāro ettamāpajjate naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:237_0: Sabbesaṁ, sabbesānaṁ, yesaṁ, yesānaṁ, tesaṁ, tesānaṁ, imesaṁ, imesānaṁ, kesaṁ, kesānaṁ, itaresaṁ, itaresānaṁ, katamesaṁ, katamesānaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:243_0: Sabbena, yena, tena, kena, anena, purisena, rūpena.
anya-e0802n2:248_0: Sabbo, yo, so, ko, amuko, puriso.
anya-e0802n2:252_0: Tasmā akārato nāvacanassa soādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:253_0: Atthaso dhammaṁ jānāti, byañjanaso atthaṁ jānāti, akkharaso, suttaso, padaso, yasaso.
anya-e0802n2:254_1: Pādena vā pādārahena vā atirekapādena vā yo bhikkhu theyyacittena parassa bhaṇḍaṁ gaṇhāti, so bhikkhu pārājiko hoti asaṁvāso.
anya-e0802n2:260_0: Tasmā akārato sabbesaṁ yonīnaṁāe ādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:264_0: Akāratoti kimatthaṁ? Daṇḍino, aṭṭhīni, aggī pajjalanti, munī caranti.
anya-e0802n2:266_0: Tasmā akārato sabbesaṁ smāsmiṁiccetesaṁ ā e ādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:268_0: Akāratoti kimatthaṁ? Daṇḍinā, daṇḍismiṁ, bhikkhunā, bhikkhusmiṁ.
anya-e0802n2:270_0: Tasmā akārato catutthekavacanassa āyādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:271_0: Atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ buddho loke uppajjati.
anya-e0802n2:275_0: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā.
anya-e0802n2:278_0: Tehi sabbanāmehi akārantehi smāsmiṁ saiccetesaṁ tayo ā e āyādesā neva honti.
anya-e0802n2:283_0: Tasmā ghato nādīnamekavacanānaṁ vibhattigaṇānaṁ āyādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:284_0: Kaññāya kataṁ kammaṁ, kaññāya dīyate, kaññāya nissaṭaṁ vatthaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:285_0: Ghatoti kimatthaṁ? Rattiyā, itthiyā, dhenuyā, vadhuyā.
anya-e0802n2:286_0: Nādīnamiti kimatthaṁ? Kaññaṁ passati, vijjaṁ, vīṇaṁ, gaṅgaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:287_0: Ekavacanānamiti kimatthaṁ? Sabbāsu, yāsu, tāsu, kāsu, imāsu, pabhāsu.
anya-e0802n2:289_0: Tasmā pato nādīnamekavacanānaṁ vibhattigaṇānaṁ yāādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:290_0: Rattiyā , itthiyā, deviyā, dhenuyā, yāguyā, vadhuyā.
anya-e0802n2:291_0: Nādīnamiti kimatthaṁ? Rattī, rattiṁ, itthī, itthiṁ.
anya-e0802n2:292_0: Patoti kimatthaṁ? Kaññāya, vīṇāya, gaṅgāya, pabhāya, sobhāya.
anya-e0802n2:295_0: Tasmā sakhato gassa akāra ākāra ikāra īkāra ekārādesā honti vā.
anya-e0802n2:296_0: Bho sakha, bho sakhā, bho sakhi, bho sakhī, bho sakhe.
anya-e0802n2:299_0: Bhoti ayye, bhoti kaññe, bhoti kharādiye.
anya-e0802n2:302_0: Tato ammādito gassa ekārattaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0802n2:303_0: Bhoti ammā, bhoti annā, bhoti ambā, bhoti tātā.
anya-e0802n2:306_0: Tasmā akatarassā lato yvālapanassa vevoādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:310_0: Ālapanasseti kimatthaṁ? Te hetavo, te bhikkhavo.
anya-e0802n2:312_0: Tasmā jhalato sassa vibhattissa no ādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:313_0: Aggino, aggissa, sakhino, sakhissa, daṇḍino, daṇḍissa, bhikkhuno, bhikkhussa, sayambhuno, sayambhussa.
anya-e0802n2:317_0: Tehi ghapajhalaiccetehi yonaṁ lopo hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:318_1: Rattī, rattiyo, itthī, itthiyo, yāgū, yāguyo, vadhū, vadhuyo.
anya-e0802n2:321_0: Tasmā lato yonaṁ vokāro hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:323_0: Kāraggahaṇaṁ kimatthaṁ? Yonaṁ no ca hoti. Jantuno.
anya-e0802n2:324_0: Caggahaṇamavadhāraṇatthaṁ, amū purisā tiṭṭhanti, amū purise passatha.
anya-e0802n2:328_0: Sabbasseva amhasaddassa savibhattissa mamaṁ ādeso hoti se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:331_0: Sabbasseva amhasaddassa savibhattissa mayaṁādeso hoti yomhi paṭhame.
anya-e0802n2:337_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa ntoādeso hoti yomhi paṭhame.
anya-e0802n2:342_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa ntassādeso hoti vā se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:346_0: Sabbassevantupaccayassa savibhattissa āādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:347_0: Guṇavā, paññavā, sīlavā, balavā, dhanavā, matimā, satimā, dhitimā.
anya-e0802n2:351_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa aṁādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi napuṁsake vattamānassa.
anya-e0802n2:352_0: Guṇavaṁ cittaṁ tiṭṭhati, rucimaṁ pupphaṁ virocati.
anya-e0802n2:353_0: Simhīti kimatthaṁ? Vaṇṇavantaṁ agandhakaṁ virūḷhapupphaṁ passasi tvaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:355_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa aṁ avaṇṇā ca honti ge pare.
anya-e0802n2:356_0: Bho guṇavaṁ, bho guṇava, bho guṇavā.
anya-e0802n2:359_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa totitāādesā honti vā sasmiṁ nāiccetesu yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:360_0: Guṇavato, guṇavantassa, guṇavati, guṇavantasmiṁ, guṇavatā, guṇavantena, satimato, satimantassa, satimati, satimantasmiṁ, satimatā, satimantena.
anya-e0802n2:363_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa taṁādeso hoti vā naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:365_0: Naṁmhīti kimatthaṁ? Guṇavanto tiṭṭhanti, satimanto tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0802n2:367_0: Sabbasseva imasaddassa savibhattissa idaṁādeso hoti vā aṁsisu napuṁsake vattamānassa.
anya-e0802n2:368_0: Idaṁ cittaṁ passasi, idaṁ cittaṁ tiṭṭhati, imaṁ cittaṁ passasi. Imaṁ cittaṁ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0802n2:369_0: Nathuṁsaketi kimatthaṁ? Imaṁ purisaṁ passasi. Ayaṁ puriso tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0802n2:371_0: Sabbasseva amusaddassa savibhattissa aduṁādeso hoti aṁsisu napuṁsake vattamānassa.
anya-e0802n2:372_0: Aduṁ pupphaṁ passasi, aduṁ pupphaṁ virocati.
anya-e0802n2:373_0: Napuṁsaketi kimatthaṁ? Amuṁ rājānaṁ passasi, asu rājā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0802n2:377_0: Dvinnaṁ saṅkhyānaṁ itthipumanapuṁsake vattamānānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ dve hoti yoiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:378_0: Dve itthiyo, dve dhammā. Dve rūpāni.
anya-e0802n2:380_0: Caggahaṇena duve dvaya ubha ubhaya duvi ca honti yonāanamiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:380_2: Duve brāhmaṇā , duve janā, dvayena, dvayaṁ, ubhinnaṁ, ubhayesaṁ duvinnaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:381_0: 133, 230.Ti catunnaṁ tisso catasso tayo cattāro tīṇi cattāri.
anya-e0802n2:382_0: Ticatunnaṁ saṅkhyānaṁ itthipumanapuṁsake vattamānānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tisso catasso tayo cattāro tīṇi cattāriiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ yoiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:383_0: Tisso vedanā catasso disā, tayo janā, jane, cattāro purisā, purise, tīṇi āyatanāni, cattāri ariyasaccāni.
anya-e0802n2:386_0: Pañcādīnaṁ saṅkhyānaṁ itthipumanapuṁsake vattamānānaṁ savibhattissa antassa sarassa akāro hoti yoiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:387_0: Pañca, pañca, cha, cha, satta, satta, aṭṭha, aṭṭha, nava, nava, dasa, dasa.
anya-e0802n2:390_0: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa rañño rājinoiccete ādesā honti se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:394_0: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññaṁādeso hoti vā naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:397_0: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññāādeso hoti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:398_0: Tena raññā kataṁ. Rājena vā kataṁ.
anya-e0802n2:401_0: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññerājiniiccete ādesā honti smiṁmhivibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:404_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amha saddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tayi mayiiccete ādeso honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ smiṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:406_0: Smiṁmhīti kimatthaṁ? Tvaṁ bhavasi, ahaṁ bhavāmi.
anya-e0802n2:408_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tvaṁ ahaṁiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:411_0: Caggahaṇena tuvaṁ ca hoti. Tuvaṁ satthā.
anya-e0802n2:413_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tavamamaiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:417_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tuyhaṁ mayhaṁiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:421_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ taṁ maiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ aṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:425_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tavaṁ mamaṁiccete ādesā honti navā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ aṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:430_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tayā mayāiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:434_0: Sabbassa tumhasaddassa savibhattissa tuvaṁ tvaṁ iccete ādesā honti aṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:435_0: Kaliṅgarassa tuvaṁ maññe, kaṭṭhassa tvaṁ maññe.
anya-e0802n2:437_0: Sabbesaṁ tumhaamhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ yadā padasmā paresaṁ vo noādesā honti navā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ dutiyā catutthīchaṭṭhīiccetesu bahuvacanesu.
anya-e0802n2:438_0: Pahāya vo bhikkhave gamissāmi, mā no ajja vikantiṁsu, rañño sūdā mahānase, evaṁ dutiyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:439_0: Dhammaṁ vo bhikkhave desessāmi, saṁvibhajetha no rajjena, evaṁ catutthyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:440_0: Tuṭṭhosmi vo bhikkhave pakatiyā, satthā no bhagavā anuppatto, evaṁ chaṭṭhyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:446_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ yadā padasmā paresaṁ te me ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ catutthīchaṭṭhīiccetesu ekavacanesu.
anya-e0802n2:447_0: Dadāmi te gāmavarāni pañca, dadāhi me gāmavaraṁ, idaṁ te raṭṭhaṁ, ayaṁ me putto.
anya-e0802n2:448_0: Padatoti kimatthaṁ? Tava ñāti, mama ñāti.
anya-e0802n2:450_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ yadā padasmā paresaṁ te meādesā na honti aṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:451_0: Passeyya taṁ vassasataṁ arogaṁ, so maṁ bravīti.
anya-e0802n2:453_0: Sabbesaṁ tumhaamhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ yadā padasmā paresaṁ temeādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ tatiyekavacane pare.
anya-e0802n2:454_0: Kataṁ te pāpaṁ, kataṁ me pāpaṁ, kataṁ tayā pāpaṁ, kataṁ mayā pāpaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:455_0: Padatoti kimatthaṁ? Tayā kataṁ, mayā kataṁ.
anya-e0802n2:457_0: Sabbesaṁ tumhaamhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ yadā padasmā paresaṁ vonoādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ tatiyābahuvacanesu paresu.
anya-e0802n2:458_0: Kataṁ vo kammaṁ, kataṁ no kammaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:459_0: Padatoti kimatthaṁ? Tumhehi kataṁ, amhehi kataṁ.
anya-e0802n2:460_0: Bahuvacanaggahaṇena yomhi paṭhame vo noādesā honti. Gāmaṁ vo gaccheyyātha, gāmaṁ no gaccheyyāma.
anya-e0802n2:462_0: Pumaiccevamantassa savibhattissa āādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:465_0: Antaggahaṇena maghava yuvaiccevamādīnamantassasavibhattissa āādeso hoti. Maghavā, yuvā.
anya-e0802n2:467_0: Pumaiccevamantassa savibhattissa aṁādeso hoti ālapanekavacane pare.
anya-e0802n2:472_0: Pumaiccevamantassa samāse ca aṁādeso hoti vibhāsā samāse kate.
anya-e0802n2:473_0: Itthī ca pumā ca napuṁsakaṁ ca itthipumanapuṁsakāni.
anya-e0802n2:476_0: Pumaiccevamantassa savibhattissa ānoādeso hoti yosu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0802n2:480_0: Pumaiccevamantassa savibhattissa āne ādeso hoti vā smiṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:486_0: Caggahaṇena maghava yuvaiccevamādīnamantassa ānaādeso hoti si yo aṁyo iccetesu vibhattīsu, pumakammathāmantassa cukāro hoti sasmā su vibhattīsu.
anya-e0802n2:486_3: Yuvāno, yuvānā, yuvānaṁ, yuvāne, pumuno, pumunā.
anya-e0802n2:491_0: Pumaiccevamantassa āuādesā honti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:495_0: Kammaiccevamantassa ca ua ādesā honti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:497_0: Caggahaṇena maghavayuvaiccevamantassa āāde so hoti kvaci nāsuiccetesu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0802n2:505_0: Tehi tumhaamhehi yo appaṭhamo ākaṁhoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:506_0: Tumhākaṁ passāmi, tumhe passāmi vā. Amhākaṁ passasi, amhe passasi vā.
anya-e0802n2:508_0: Appaṭhamoti kimatthaṁ? Gacchatha tumhe, gacchāma mayaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:509_0: Vātivikappanatthena yonaṁ aṁ ānaṁ honti. Tumhaṁ tumhānaṁ. Amhaṁ, amhānaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:511_0: Tehi humhaamhehi sassa vibhattissa aṁ ādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:515_0: Sabbesaṁ sabbanāmānaṁ akārato yo paṭhamo ettamāpajjate.
anya-e0802n2:516_0: Sabbe, ye, te, ke, tumhe, amhe, ime.
anya-e0802n2:517_0: Sabbanāmāti kimatthaṁ? Devā, asurā, nāgā, gandhabbā, manussā.
anya-e0802n2:519_0: Yoti kimatthaṁ? Sabbo, yo, so, ko, ayaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:522_0: Tasmā sabbanāma’kārato dvandaṭṭhā yo paṭhamo ettamāpajjate vā.
anya-e0802n2:530_0: Bahubbīhimhi ca samāse sabbanāmavidhānañca nāññaṁ kāriyaṁ hoti.
anya-e0802n2:532_1: Sabbanāmavidhānaṁ hoti, dakkhiṇa pubbassaṁ, dakkhiṇapubbassā, uttarapubbassaṁ, uttarapubbassā.
anya-e0802n2:534_0: Sabbato sabbanāmato naṁvacanassa saṁsānaṁiccete ādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:536_0: Namiti kimatthaṁ? Sabbassa, yassa, tassa, kassa. Evaṁ sabbattha.
anya-e0802n2:543_0: Sabbasseva imasaddassa ekāro hoti vā sunaṁhiiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:544_0: Esu, imesu, esaṁ, imesaṁ, ehi, ebhi, imehi, imebhi.
anya-e0802n2:545_0: Imasseti kimatthaṁ? Etesu, etesaṁ, etehi, etebhi.
anya-e0802n2:547_0: Imasaddassa sabbasseva ana imiiccete ādesā honti nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:548_0: Anena dhammadānena. Sukhitā hotu sā pajā.
anya-e0802n2:550_0: Nāmhīti kimatthaṁ? Imesu, imesaṁ, imehi, imebhi.
anya-e0802n2:552_0: Imasaddassa sabbasseva anapuṁsakassa ayaṁādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:555_0: Simhīti kimatthaṁ? Imaṁ purisaṁ passasi tvaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:557_0: Amusaddassa anapuṁsakassa makāro sakāramāpajjate vā simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:558_0: Asu rājā, asu itthī, amuko rājā, amukā itthī.
anya-e0802n2:563_0: Eta taiccetesaṁ anapuṁsakānaṁ takāro sakāramāpajjate simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:564_0: Eso puriso, esā itthī, so puriso, sā itthī.
anya-e0802n2:565_0: Etatesamiti kimatthaṁ? Itaro puriso, itarā itthī.
anya-e0802n2:566_0: Anapuṁsakānamiti kimatthaṁ? Etaṁ cittaṁ, etaṁ rūpaṁ. Taṁ cittaṁ, taṁ rūpaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:568_0: Tassa sabbanāmassa takārassa nattaṁ hoti vā sabbattha liṅgesu.
anya-e0802n2:569_0: Nāya, tāya, naṁ, taṁ, ne, te, nesu, tesu, namhi, tamhi, nāhi, tāhi, nābhi, tābhi.
anya-e0802n2:571_0: Tassa sabbanāmassa takārassa sabbasseva attaṁ hoti vā sasmāsmiṁ saṁsāiccetesu sabbattha liṅgesu.
anya-e0802n2:572_0: Assa, tassa, asmā, tasmā, asmiṁ, tasmiṁ, assaṁ, tassaṁ, assā, tassā.
anya-e0802n2:576_0: Imasaddassa ca sabbasseva attaṁ hoti vā sasmāsmiṁ saṁ sāiccetesu sabbattha liṅgesu.
anya-e0802n2:577_0: Assa , imassa, asmā, imasmā, asmiṁ, imasmiṁ, assaṁ, imissaṁ, assā, imissā.
anya-e0802n2:580_0: Sabbato sabbanāmato kakārāgamo hoti vā simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:582_0: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Sabbo, yo, so, ko.
anya-e0802n2:584_0: Puna sabbatoggahaṇena aññasmāpi kakārāgamo hoti, hīnako, potako.
anya-e0802n2:586_0: Sabbato sabbanāmato ghapasaññato smiṁsaiccetesaṁ saṁsā ādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:587_0: Sabbassaṁ, sabbassā, sabbāyaṁ, sabbāya, imissaṁ, imissā, imāyaṁ, imāya, amussaṁ, amussā, amuyaṁ, amuyā.
anya-e0802n2:591_0: Etehi sabbanāmehi ghapasaññehi smiṁvacanassa neva āya yāādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:592_0: Etissaṁ, etāyaṁ, imissaṁ, imāyaṁ, amussaṁ, amuyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:594_0: Etāhīti kimatthaṁ? Kaññāya, vīṇāya, gaṅgāya, kapālikāya.
anya-e0802n2:596_0: Tasmā manogaṇādito smiṁnāiccetesaṁ ikāraākārādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:597_0: Manasi, manusmiṁ, sirasi, sirasmiṁ, manasā, manena, vacasā, vacena, sirasā, sirena, sarasā, sarena, tapasā, tapena, vayasā, vayena, yasasā, yasena, tejasā, tejena, urasā, urena, thāmasā, thāmena.
anya-e0802n2:598_0: Smiṁnānamiti kimatthaṁ? Mano, siro, tamo, tapo, tejo.
anya-e0802n2:599_0: Ādiggahaṇena aññāsmāpi smiṁnānaṁ ikāraākārādesā honti, bilasi, bilasā, padasi, padasā.
anya-e0802n2:601_0: Tasmā manogaṇādito sassa ca okāro hoti.
anya-e0802n2:604_0: Etesaṁ manogaṇādīnaṁ anto ottamāpajjate vibhattilope kate.
anya-e0802n2:607_0: Lopeti kimatthaṁ? Padayā, tapasā, yasasā, vacasā, manasā, evamaññepi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n2:609_0: Eteheva manogaṇādīhi vibhattādese sare pare sakārāgamo hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:613_0: Puna ādiggahaṇena aññasmimpi paccaye pare sakārāgamo hoti. Mānasikaṁ, vācasikaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:615_0: Sabbassa santasaddassa sakārādeso hoti bhakāre pare, ante ca bakārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0802n2:626_0: Caggahaṇaṁ kvaci sakārasseva pasiddhatthaṁ. Sakkāro, sakkato.
anya-e0802n2:629_0: Gacchaṁ, gacchanto, mahaṁ, mahanto, caraṁ, caranto, khādaṁ, khādanto.
anya-e0802n2:630_0: Gacchantādīnamiti kimatthaṁ? Anto, danto, vanto, santo.
anya-e0802n2:633_0: Gacchato, mahato, gacchati, mahati, gacchatā, mahatā.
anya-e0802n2:634_0: Sesesūti kimatthaṁ? Gacchaṁ, mahaṁ, caraṁ, khādaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:636_0: Brahma atta sakha rājaiccevamādito aṁvacanassa ānaṁ hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:637_0: Brahmānaṁ, brahmaṁ, attānaṁ, attaṁ, sakhānaṁ, sakhaṁ, rājānaṁ, rājaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:640_0: Brahma atta sakha rājaiccevamādito sivacanassa ā ca hoti.
anya-e0802n2:643_0: Brahmaatta sakha rājaiccevamādito yonaṁ ānoādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:646_0: Tasmā sakhato ca yonaṁ āyo no ādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:650_0: Tasmā sakhato smiṁvacanassa ekāro hoti. Sakhe.
anya-e0802n2:652_0: Tasmā brahmato gassa ca ekāro hoti. He brahme.
anya-e0802n2:658_0: Tassa sakhantassa āro hoti vā himhi vibhattimhi. Sakhārehi, sakhehi.
anya-e0802n2:660_0: Tassa sakhantassa āro hoti vā sunaṁ aṁiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:661_0: Sakhāresu, sakhesu, sakhārānaṁ, sakhīnaṁ, sakhāraṁ, sakhaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:663_0: Tasmā brahmato smiṁvacanassa niādeso hoti. Brahmani.
anya-e0802n2:664_0: Tuggahaṇena abrahmatopi smiṁ vacanassa ni hoti. Kammani, cammani, muddhani.
anya-e0802n2:670_0: Satthupituādīnamanto attamāpajjate sismiṁ, silopo ca hoti.
anya-e0802n2:672_0: Sisminti kimatthaṁ? Satthussa, pitussa, mātussa, bhātussa, kattussa.
anya-e0802n2:675_0: Satthāraṁ, pitaraṁ, mātaraṁ, bhātaraṁ, kattāraṁ, satthārehi, pitarehi, mātarehi, bhātarehi, kattārehi.
anya-e0802n2:676_0: Aññesvīti kimatthaṁ? Satthā, pitā, mātā, bhātā, kattā.
anya-e0802n2:680_0: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Satthānaṁ, pitūnaṁ, mātūnaṁ, bhātūnaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:682_0: Tassa satthusaddassa anto attamāpajjate vā naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:684_0: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Satthārānaṁ, pitarānaṁ, mātarānaṁ, bhātarānaṁ, dhītarānaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:687_0: Satthupituiccevamādīnamantassa uttaṁ hoti vā sasmiṁ, salopo ca.
anya-e0802n2:688_0: Satthu , satthussa, satthuno dīyate, pariggaho vā.
anya-e0802n2:688_1: Pitu, pitussa, pituno dīyate, pariggaho vā.
anya-e0802n2:688_2: Bhātu, bhātussa, bhātuno dīyate, pariggaho vā.
anya-e0802n2:691_0: Sakkamandhātuiccevamādīnamanto uttamāpajjate sasmiṁ, salopo ca hoti.
anya-e0802n2:692_0: Sakkamandhātu iva assa rājino vibhavo. Evaṁ kattu, gantu, dātu iccevamādī.
anya-e0802n2:696_0: Tato ārādesato sabbesaṁ yo naṁ okārādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:697_0: Satthāro, pitaro, mātaro, bhātaro, kattāro, vattāro.
anya-e0802n2:698_0: Tuggahaṇena aññasmāpi yonaṁ okāro hoti. Caturo janā, gāvo, ubho purisā.
anya-e0802n2:701_0: Satthari, pitari, mātari, dhītari, bhātari, kattari, vattari.
anya-e0802n2:702_0: Puna tatogahaṇena aññasmāpi smiṁvacanassa ikāro hoti. Bhuvi.
anya-e0802n2:705_0: Satthārā, pitarā, mātarā, bhātarā, dhītarā, kattārā, vattārā.
anya-e0802n2:708_0: Satthari, pitari, mātari, dhītari, kattari, vattari.
anya-e0802n2:711_0: Pitarā, mātarā, bhātarā, mītarā pitaro, mātaro, bhātaro, dhītaro.
anya-e0802n2:712_0: Asimhiggahaṇaṁtomhi pare ikārādesañāpanatthaṁ. Mātito, pitito, bhātito, duhitito.
anya-e0802n2:720_0: Tassa attano anto anattamāpajjate himhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:724_0: Anattamitibhāvaniddesena attasaddassa sakādeso hoti sabbāsu vibhattīsu. Sako, sakā, sakaṁ, sake.
anya-e0802n2:726_0: Tato attato smiṁvacanassa ni hoti. Attani.
anya-e0802n2:728_0: Tatoattato sassa vibhattissa no hoti, attano.
anya-e0802n2:730_0: Tato attato smā vacanassa nā hoti. Attanā.
anya-e0802n2:731_0: Puna tatogahaṇena tassa attano takārasseva rakāro hoti sabbesu vacanesu. Atrajo, atrajaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:737_0: Tasmā ghapato smiṁ vacanassa yaṁ hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:738_0: Kaññāyaṁ , kaññāya. Rattiyaṁ, rattiyā. Itthiyaṁ, itthiyā. Yāguyaṁ, yāguyā. Vakhuyaṁ, vadhuyā.
anya-e0802n2:740_0: Sabbesaṁ yonaṁ ni hoti vā napuṁsakehi liṅgehi.
anya-e0802n2:744_0: Akārantehi napuṁsakaliṅgehi yonaṁ ni hoti niccaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:745_0: Yāni, yāni. Tāni, tāni. Kāni, kāni. Bhayāni, bhayāni. Rūpāni, rūpāni.
anya-e0802n2:747_0: Akārantehi napuṁsakaliṅgehi sivacanassa aṁ hoti niccaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:750_0: Tato niddiṭṭhehi ligehi sesakhatā gasiiccete lopamāpajjante.
anya-e0802n2:754_0: Sabbāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ ekavacanabahuvacanānaṁ paṭhamā dutiyātatiyā catutthī pañcamī chaṭṭhī sattamīnaṁ lopo hoti, āvuso upasagga nipātaiccevamādīhi ca,
anya-e0802n2:755_0: Tvaṁ panāvuso, tumhe panāvuso, padaso dhammaṁ vāceyya, vihāraṁ sve upagaccheyya.
anya-e0802n2:756_0: Pa, parā, ni, nī, u, du, saṁ, vi, ava, anu, pari, adhi, abhi, pati, su, ā, ati, api, apa, upa, pahāro, parābhavo, nihāro, nīhāro, uhāro, duhāro, saṁhāro, vihāro, avahāro, anuhāro, parihāro, adhihāro, abhihāro, patihāro, suhāro, āhāro, atihāro, apihāro, apahāro, upahāro, evaṁ vīsati upasaggehi ca.
anya-e0802n2:757_0: Yathā, tathā, evaṁ, khalu, kho, tatra, atho, atha, hi, tu ca, vā, vo, haṁ, abhaṁ, alaṁ, eva, ho aho, he , ahe, re, are, evamādīhi nipātehi ca yojetabbāni.
anya-e0802n2:760_0: Pumaiccetassa anto lopamāpajjate liṅgādīsu parapadesu samāsesu.
anya-e0802n2:766_0: Aṁ vacanassa yaṁ hoti vā īto pasaññato.
anya-e0802n2:771_0: Tasmā jhato katarassā aṁ vacanassa naṁ hoti.
anya-e0802n2:776_0: Sabbesaṁ yonaṁ jhato katarassā no hoti.
anya-e0802n2:777_0: Daṇḍino bhogino, he daṇḍino, he bhogino.
anya-e0802n2:782_0: Tasmā jhato katarassā smiṁvacanassa niāde so hoti.
anya-e0802n2:786_0: Kimiccetassa ko ca hoti vapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:788_0: Caggahaṇena avapaccaye parepi ko ca hoti. Ko taṁninditu marahati, kathaṁ bodhayituṁ dhammaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:791_0: Kimiccetassa ku hoti hiṁ haṁiccetesu ca. Kuhiṁ gacchasi, kulaṁ gacchasi.
anya-e0802n2:792_0: Caggahaṇena hiñcanaṁdācanaṁ paccayesu paresu aññatthāpi ku hoti. Kuhiñcanaṁ, kudācanaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:794_0: Kimiccetassa ko hoti sesesu vibhattipaccayesu paresu.
anya-e0802n2:795_0: Ko pakāro kathaṁ, kaṁ pakāraṁ kathaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:798_0: Kimiccetassa ku hoti tratotha iccetesu ca.
anya-e0802n2:802_0: Sabbassa etasaddassa akāro hoti vā tothaiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:805_0: Sabbassa etasaddassa akāro hoti niccaṁ trapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:808_0: Sabbassa etasaddassa ekāro hoti vā tothaiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:810_0: 234, 265.Imassi thaṁ dāni ha to dhesu ca.
anya-e0802n2:811_0: Imasaddassa sabbasseva ikāro hoti thaṁ dānihato dhaiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:814_0: Imasaddassa sabbasseva akāro hoti dhunāmhi paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:818_0: Sabbasseva imasaddassa etādeso hoti rahimhi paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:824_0: Nadādito vāanadāditovā itthiyaṁ vattamānāya īpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0802n2:825_0: Nadī, mahī, kumārī, taruṇī, sakhī, itthī.
anya-e0802n2:827_0: Ṇava ṇika ṇeyya ṇa ntuiccetehi itthiyaṁ vattamānehi īpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0802n2:828_0: Māṇavī, paṇḍavī, nāvikī, venateyyī, kunteyyī, gotamī, guṇavatī, sāmāvatī.
anya-e0802n2:830_0: Pati bhikkhu rājīkārantehi itthiyaṁ vattamānehi inīpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0802n2:831_0: Gahapatānī, bhikkhunī, rājinī, hatthinī, daṇḍinī, medhāvinī, tapassinī.
anya-e0802n2:833_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa takāro hoti vā īkāre pare.
anya-e0802n2:836_0: Sabbasseva bhavantasaddassa bhotādeso hoti īkāre itthigate pare.
anya-e0802n2:837_0: Bhoti ayye, bhoti kaññe, bhoti kharādiye.
anya-e0802n2:839_0: Sabbasseva bhavantasaddassa bhoādeso hoti ge pare.
anya-e0802n2:840_0: Bho purisa, bho aggi, bho rāja, bho sattha, bho daṇḍi, bho sayambhu.
anya-e0802n2:842_0: Tuggahaṇena aññasmimpi vacane sabbassa bhavantasaddassa bhonta bhante bhonto bhadde bhotā bho toiccete ādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:843_0: Bhonta, bhante, bhonto, bhadde, bhotā, bhoto.
anya-e0802n2:845_0: Akāro ca pitādīnamanto ca attamāpajjate ge pare.
anya-e0802n2:846_0: Bho purisā, bho rājā, bho pitā, bho mātā, bho satthā.
anya-e0802n2:849_0: Bho daṇḍi, bho sayambhu, bhoti itthi, bhotivadhu,
anya-e0802n2:852_0: Bho rāja, bho rājā, bho atta, bho attā, bho sakha, bho sakhā, bho sattha, bho satthā.
anya-e0802n2:856_0: Toādi yesaṁ paccayānaṁ, te honti tvādayo. Te paccayā tvādayo vibhattisaññāva daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0802n2:857_0: Sabbato, yato, tato, kuto, ato, ito, sabbadā, yadā, tadā, kadā, idha, idāni.
anya-e0802n2:860_0: Sabbato, yato, tato, kuto, ato, ito.
anya-e0802n2:863_0: Trathaiccete paccayā honti sattamyatthe sabba nāmehi.
anya-e0802n2:864_0: Sabbatra, sabbattha, yatra, yattha, tatra, tattha.
anya-e0802n2:866_0: Sabbaiccetasmā dhipaccayo hoti kvaci sattamyatthe. Sabbadhi, sabbasmiṁ.
anya-e0802n2:874_0: Tamhā ca hi haṁiccete paccayā honti sattamyatthe. Tahiṁ, tahaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:877_0: Imasmā hadhaiccete paccayā honti sattamyatthe. Iha, idha.
anya-e0802n2:880_0: Tasmā yato hiṁpaccayo hoti sattamyatthe. Yahiṁ.
anya-e0802n2:884_0: Kiṁ sabbaañña eka ya kuiccetehi dā dācanaṁiccete paccayā honti kāle sattamyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:885_0: Kadā, sabbadā, aññadā, ekadā, yadā, kudācanaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:887_0: Taiccetasmā dāni dāiccete paccayā honti, kāle sattamyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:891_0: Imasmā rahi dhunā dāniiccete paccayā honti kāle sattamyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:895_0: Sabbaiccetassa sakārādeso hoti vā dāmhi paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:899_0: Bāhussaccaṁ, paṇḍiccaṁ, vepullaṁ, kāruññaṁ, kosallaṁ, sāmaññaṁ, sohajjaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:901_0: Sabbasseva vuḍḍhasaddassa joādeso hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:904_0: Sabbasseva pasatthasaddassa soādeso hoti, jādeso ca iyaiṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:907_0: Sabbassa antikasaddassa nedādeso hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:910_0: Sabbassa bāḷhasaddassa sādhādeso hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:913_0: Sabbassa appasaddassa kaṇa ādeso hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:916_0: Sabbassa yuvasaddassa kaṇa ādeso hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:920_0: Vantumantuvīiccetesaṁ paccayānaṁ lopo hoti iyaiṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:921_0: Guṇiyo, guṇiṭṭho, satiyo, satiṭṭho, medhiyo, medhiṭṭho.
anya-e0802n2:922_0: 269, 401.Yavataṁ ta la ṇa dakārānaṁ byañjanāni ca la ña jakārattaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:923_0: Yakāravantānaṁ ta la ṇa dakārānaṁ byañjanāni ca la ña jakārattamāpajjante yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:924_0: Bāhussaccaṁ, paṇḍiccaṁ, vepullaṁ, kāruññaṁ, kosallaṁ, nepuññaṁ, sāmaññaṁ, sohajjaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:926_0: Ta la ṇa dakārānamiti kimatthaṁ? Ālasyaṁ, ārogyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:930_0: Amha tumhanturāja brahma atta sakha satthu pituiccevamādīhi smāvacanaṁ nāva daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:931_0: Mayā, tayā, guṇavatā, raññā, brahmunā, attanā, sakhinā, satthārā, pitarā, mātarā, bhātarā, dhītarā, kattārā, vattārā.
